scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "Tailwind CSS,Hugo" -c "blue,green" "yarpm run watch-tailwind" "yarpm run watch-hugo"
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -c ./themes/blowfish/tailwind.config.js -i ./themes/blowfish/assets/css/main.css -o ./assets/css/compiled/main.css --jit && hugo --cleanDestinationDir -e production --minify
scripts.bootstrap: git submodule update --init --recursive && yarpm i && yarpm --prefix themes/blowfish/ install
